This device does not support Play Services. Tap to disable system battery optimizations that prevent Signal from retrieving messages while inactive.
Say hello to secure video calls.
Signal now supports secure video calling.
Signal now supports secure video calling. Tap to explore.
Signal now supports secure video calling. Just start a Signal call like normal, tap the video button, and wave hello.
TextSecure and RedPhone are now one private messenger, for every situation: Signal.
TextSecure and RedPhone are now one app: Signal. Tap to explore.

An unexpected error happened that has made group creation fail.
You need at least one person in your group!
You\'re not registered for Signal messages and calls, so Signal groups are disabled. Please try registering in Settings > Advanced.
Restoring an encrypted backup will completely replace your existing keys, preferences, and messages. You will lose any information that\'s in your current Signal install but not in the backup.
This will import messages from a plaintext backup. If you\'ve previously imported this backup, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
This will import messages from the system\'s default SMS database to Signal. If you\'ve previously imported the system\'s SMS database, importing again will result in duplicated messages.

Error downloading MMS message, tap to retry
The version of Google Play Services you have installed is not functioning correctly. Please reinstall Google Play Services and try again.
TextSecure is a messaging app that allows you to take back your privacy while easily communicating with friends.

Using TextSecure, you can communicate instantly while avoiding SMS fees, create groups so that you can chat in real time with all your friends at once, and share media or attachments all with complete privacy. The server never has access to any of your communication and never stores any of your data.
* Private. TextSecure uses an advanced end to end encryption protocol that provides privacy for every message every time.

* Open Source. TextSecure is Free and Open Source, enabling anyone to verify its security by auditing the code. TextSecure is the only private messenger that uses open source peer-reviewed cryptographic protocols to keep your messages safe.

* Group Chat. TextSecure allows you to create encrypted groups so you can have private conversations with all your friends at once. Not only are the messages encrypted, but the TextSecure server never has access to any group metadata such as the membership list, group title, or group icon.
* Fast. The TextSecure protocol is designed to operate in the most constrained environment possible. Using TextSecure, messages are instantly delivered to friends.
Please file any bugs, issues, or feature requests at:
Quick response unavailable when Signal is locked!
If you enjoy using this app, please take a moment to help us by rating it.

This device is missing Google Play Services. You can still use Signal, but this configuration may result in reduced reliability or performance.\n\nIf you are not an advanced user, are not running an aftermarket Android ROM, or believe that you are seeing this in error, please contact support@whispersystems.org for help trouble shooting.

Unable to connect. Please check your network connection and try again.
You must enter the code you received first

No safety number to compare was found in the clipboard
The scanned QR code is not a correctly formatted safety number verification code. Please try scanning again.
Your contact is running a newer version of Signal with an incompatible QR code format. Please update to compare.
Your contact is running an old version of Signal. Please ask them to update before verifying your safety number.
The safety number for your conversation with %1$s has changed. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %2$s simply re-installed Signal.
You may wish to verify your safety number with this contact.
Auto-select APNs has failed, try picking your carrier from the preset list instead in MMS settings

Multiple different APNs were found for your carrier, which will be listed after clicking the message below. If one of the following doesn't work for you, try another and one of them should work correctly!

Remember you can always get to this APN selection by going into Settings, going to the MMS Settings page, and then selecting the "Automatically Select APNs" option.

You also have the option under MMS settings to select from a list of preset APNs that could work instead of these that have been automatically found.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
The default system database will not be modified or altered in any way.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when the import is complete.
Would you like to import your existing text messages into Signal\'s encrypted database?

Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
A fast ImageView (and Drawable) that supports rounded corners (and ovals or circles) based on the original example from Romain Guy.

Require approval of new safety numbers when they change
Display invitation prompts for contacts without Signal

Signal requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, tap \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
on the same day each month

Signal makes it easy to communicate by using your existing phone number and address book. Friends and contacts who already know how to contact you by phone will be able to easily get in touch by Signal.\n\nRegistration transmits some contact information to the server. It is not stored.
Verify your phone number to connect with Signal.
YOUR COUNTRY CODE AND PHONE NUMBER
Please check to make sure you entered your number correctly, and that it is formatted correctly for your region.
Signal will not work with Google Voice numbers.

Some third party text messaging clients, such as Handcent or GoSMS, behave poorly and intercept all incoming SMS messages. Check to see if you received a text message that starts with \'Your Signal verification code:\', in which case you\'ll need to configure your third party text messaging app to let text messages through.
If you are connected via Wi-Fi, it\'s possible that there is a firewall blocking access to the Signal server. Try another network or mobile data.
Signal can also call you to verify your number. Tap \'Call Me\' and enter the six digit code that you hear below.
Signal timed out while waiting for a verification SMS message.
Signal was unable to connect to the server.
Signal will now automatically verify your number with a confirmation SMS message.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when verification is complete.
Your device needs network connectivity in order to use this Signal feature. Check to ensure that it is connected to mobile data or Wi-Fi.
Your version of Signal has expired!
Messages will no longer send successfully. Tap to update to the most recent version.
Take your conversation with %1$s to the next level.
Your version of Signal is outdated
Your version of Signal will expire today. Tap to update to the most recent version.
The more friends use Signal, the better it gets.
Tap to make Signal your default SMS app.
Tap to copy your phone\'s SMS messages into Signal\'s encrypted database.
Couldn\'t send due to network problem.

If you wish to verify the security of your end-to-end encryption with %s, compare the number above with the number on their device. Alternatively, you can scan the code on their phone, or ask them to scan your code. Learn more about verifying safety numbers

Starting with Android Marshmallow, multimedia messaging applications can no longer directly request to send messages over your mobile data, which is a requirement for sending things like pictures.\n\nTo be able to send messages, the app will need the write settings permission, which must be explicitly granted. Without this, multimedia messages will fail to send.
